channel.title: DragonzPkzScape V13 Dev Team Repost ~Recuiting Now~
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i18.tinypic.com/7wk2wb6.gif[/img]
Hello Guys How Are You Today Well Im Brilliant I Am Currently Recuiting A Dev Team For V13 I Hope It To Be A Brilliant Sucess And If I Ever Release You Guys Get 70% Credits
Colour Code
Declined Accepted Pending
Contents
1. Goals 2. Information 3. FAQ 4. Applications
[b]We have simple goals[/b]
[b] • To make an official server, which is unlike every other one you see.
• To make an RuneScape realistic server.
• To make training hard like runescape
• To Add Specials And Silabs.[/b]
Information 2
Soruce: PimpScape (You Choose) Hoster: Apply Website: Paid For Silabs: Coding In Npc's: In Real Place's From Rs Shops: Someone Needs To Add These
Msn: rickscape-support@hotmail.co.uk
FAQ
Question - Can you be an Administrator on the forums, or server? Answer - If you are able to be active, and truely earn it.. You may be able to.
Question - I don't speak English, is it still possible for me to help the server? Answer - I'm sorry, but no. We're looking for people with high English skills, because we don't want a server where it sends a message saying "o fo zizzle yo fo doozle", we want it to be proper English. But we do have an "Other Languages" board on our forums, so you could chat about the server there.
Question - Where Can I Get Forum Link? Answer - In My Signature
Have Any Other Questions Ask Here.
Applictions
Here are the filled positions, and the amount of members needed.
Coders 5 (Server)
X Pked X Waffles! - - -
Hoster 1
-
Server Mods 5 (Not Applible)
- - - - -
Server Admins 5 (Cant Apply There Earned
- - - - -
Apply Form
[code]Name: Experiance: Java Skills:1/10 Place: Hosting/Coding Hosting Time: What Soruce Do U Want:[/code]

item.title: DragonzPkzScape V13 Dev Team Repost ~Recuiting Now~
item.dc:creator: @Pureman0194 Pureman0194
item.description:
@Pureman0194 wrote:

[quote=“dki demon, post:13, topic:157732”]Name:Dki Demon
Experiance: about 2 years on moparscape
Java Skills:3/10
Place: Hosting servers, (not so good at making tho but would love to host
Hosting Time: 2 years
What Soruce Do U Want: i dont care[/quote]

Your Declined

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:12, topic:157732”]Name: Don’t want to say, if you have to know, i’ll PM
Experiance: Coded for 1 year 7 months now.
Java Skills: I’m not the best Java programmer in the world, but i’d say i’m ok… So 4-5/10 ?.. And if by Java you mean server sided i’d say 6-7 … Java as in other things 4-5…
Place: Server Coder.
Hosting Time: Urrrhh, i could host it would be up for like… 20/7 … Depending on how my computer feels :). Sometimes we get powercuts, so the computer turns off, until i get home…
What Soruce Do U Want: I’m not too fussed… Cause as a coder, i would help to add everything in, fix bugs, good member of the team… Etc…

My own message to you: If this is one of those Dev teams that say “Accepted” then never speak to me again. I don’t want to join. If you’re going to be speaking to me a while, asking questions etc… Then sure ;)… I also like to get straight to the point, if i am accepted, i don’t want to be waiting like 2-3 weeks just for another 2-3 coders / 2 web designers?.. Or what ever your positions are… So ASAP would be nice. If i’m not accepted. Goodluck with your project ;).[/quote]

X J K X Ur Accepted Add Me Now On Msn[br][size=1]Posted on: November 08, 2007, 12:31:00 PM[/size][hr]Your Accepted

Read full topic
